events.headline: Outbreak is an international public health emergency
Threat to international peace and security
Chief medical officer has put herself under quarantine
events.summary: Liberia's chief medical officer has put herself under quarantine for 21 days, after one of her assistants died from the deadly Ebola virus.

events.headline: Ebola killing robot developed in San Antonio
events.summary: San Antonio - A local invention may turn out to be a key piece of technology in the fight against Ebola. It's a robot used by hospitals to disinfect and destroy bacteria and viruses.
